original_text: For by now I could have put out my hand and struck you and your people with pestilence, and you would have been cut off from the earth.
korean_text: 내가 손을 펴서 돌림병으로 너와 네 백성을 쳤더라면 네가 세상에서 끊어졌을 것이나

sentences.original_text: For by now I could have put out my hand
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이미 손을 뻗었을 수도 있었다.

sentences.original_text: and struck you and your people with pestilence
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 네 백성을 전염병으로 쳤을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: and you would have been cut off from the earth.
